name: Blockchain Blues
description:
I composed this song almost two weeks after I started minting works here. I recorded at the beginning of this year so I like the idea of it being a benevolent intention for all of us.
This community and the possibility of a reward for dedication and creativity make me feel very grateful. Thank you fellow artists and collectors, for making this ecosystem a place where creating and sharing have never been so close. I wish us a beautiful year. 


Oh dear collector
take my work, make me live
i will give you this song
this blockchain blues

i want to drik beer
and toast with de artists 
to whomever i do, long live
long live the blockchain blues

querido coleccionista
toma mi obra, hazme vivir
te regalo esta canción
este blockchain blues

te regalo esta canción
este blockchain blues
